title: Dragonbane (EvilHack)
data:
| \[   Dragonbane   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                     | [leather gloves](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Affiliation                   | - [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| When carried                  | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| When worn                     | * [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection")
* [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance")
* [warned of dragons](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type")
* [dragons](/index.php?title=Dragon_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dragon (EvilHack) (page does not exist)") that see it become hostile
* deals 1d6 + 2 damage on contact with dragons |
| When invoked                  | none                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Base price                    | 3000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Weight                        | [13](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

**[Dragonbane](/wiki/Dragonbane "Dragonbane")** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), and has been significantly altered from the artifact in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [pair of gloves](/wiki/Pair_of_gloves "Pair of gloves") made of [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide").

## Generation

In addition to random generation, Dragonbane can be given as a [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") to any character, though it will never be the first artifact given.

## Description

While worn, Dragonbane confers [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") and [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), and [warns of dragons](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type"). Any [dragon](/index.php?title=Dragon_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dragon (EvilHack) (page does not exist)") that sees the character wearing Dragonbane will turn hostile if they were not already hostile, and dragons that make contact with Dragonbane (either via unarmed attack or passively when attacking its wearer) takes an additional 1d6 + 2 damage - this does not include dragon-like monsters in the same [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class"), i.e. the [fell beast](/wiki/Fell_beast "Fell beast") or any of the growth stages of [pseudodragon](/wiki/Pseudodragon_\(EvilHack\) "Pseudodragon (EvilHack)"). Dragonbane also completely resists [disintegration](/wiki/Disintegration "Disintegration") from the [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") weapon or [passive](/wiki/Passive "Passive") attacks of [black dragons](/wiki/Black_dragon "Black dragon"), and has the standard 19⁄20 chance for artifacts of resisting disintegration from other sources.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dragonbane_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit)*
html:
Dragonbane (EvilHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Dragonbane   (No tile)
Base item leather gloves
Affiliation
  • unaligned
When carried none
When worn
  • reflection
  • acid resistance
  • warned of dragons
  • dragons that see it become hostile
  • deals 1d6 + 2 damage on contact with dragons
When invoked none
Base price 3000 zm
Weight 13

Dragonbane is an artifact that appears in EvilHack, and has been significantly altered from the artifact in NetHack. It is unaligned, and its base item is a pair of gloves made of dragonhide.

Generation

In addition to random generation, Dragonbane can be given as a sacrifice gift to any character, though it will never be the first artifact given.

Description

While worn, Dragonbane confers reflection and acid resistance, and warns of dragons. Any dragon that sees the character wearing Dragonbane will turn hostile if they were not already hostile, and dragons that make contact with Dragonbane (either via unarmed attack or passively when attacking its wearer) takes an additional 1d6 + 2 damage - this does not include dragon-like monsters in the same monster class, i.e. the fell beast or any of the growth stages of pseudodragon. Dragonbane also completely resists disintegration from the breath weapon or passive attacks of black dragons, and has the standard 19⁄20 chance for artifacts of resisting disintegration from other sources.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
